message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Could we perhaps meet somewhere closer to $10000?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I've got to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10000 and $12000. How about we say $11500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on a price closer to $10000?
